000488.SZ.summary: Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited engages in the pulp production and paper making in Mainland China and internationally. It operates through five segments: Machine Paper, Financial Services, Magnesium Ore, Investment Real Estate, and Others. The company offers offset paper, white paper board, coated paper, lightweight coated paper, household paper, electrostatic copy paper and thermal paper, glassine paper; and paper making raw materials and machinery. It also generates and sells electric and thermal power; manufactures, processes, and sells wood products, laminated boards, and fortified wooden floorboards; provides cement, wall materials, panel, and coal; and purchases and sells waste, as well as offers financial leasing services. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of catering services; hotel services; forestry, saplings growing, and processing and sale of timber and paper products; and mining, transportation, logistics, arboriculture, customs declaration, property management, import and export trade, machinery manufacturing, printing and packaging, and investment management businesses. Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Shouguang, the People's Republic of China.

000815.SZ.long_name: MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd.
000815.SZ.summary: MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. The company offers cultural paper products, such as double-adhesive paper under the Miliyun brand, electrostatic copy paper under the Feng Yanglan brand, and offset and anti-myopia paper; color paper products, including offset, copy, cardboard, pearlescent, embossed base, silk cotton, and other paper, as well as fluorescent and ordinary business stickers; and corrugated, textured, and offset printing paper. It also provides cloud computing services. The company was formerly known as MCC Meili Paper Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd. in July 2016. MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd. is based in Zhongwei, China.

002067.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Jingxing Paper Joint Stock Co., Ltd.
002067.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jingxing Paper Joint Stock Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products primarily in China. It offers Kraft liner boards, white top linerboards, bobbin base papers, corrugated base papers, corrugated cardboards, paper boxes, bobbin base papers, and other specialty papers under the Jingxing brand name. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Pinghu, China.

002078.SZ.summary: Shandong Sunpaper Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. It offers coated papers, offset papers, and light-weight papers; copy papers, digital coated papers, and digital color laser papers; PE-coated paperboard for food packaging, sheet lining, service plate paper, and base paper for food products; and craft papers, recycled craft papers, fluting medium, white craft papers, coated ivory board, chrome ivory board, and cigarette carton papers. The company also provides industrial papers, including one-sided coated papers, coated paper without fluorescer, release base papers, interleaving papers for PS plate, stainless steel interleaving papers, aluminum foil interleaving papers, and thermal-sensitive base papers; and household paper products, such as coreless roll paper, roll toilet paper, box tissues, packet tissues, handkerchief paper, wet tissues, and baby diapers. In addition, it offers natural cellulose and craft board paper; and operates Shandong Sun Plaza International Hotel. Shandong Sunpaper Co., Ltd. offers its products under the Golden Sun, Huaxia Sun, Tian Yang, Weier, Sun Element, and Suyappy brands. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

002235.SZ.summary: Xiamen Anne Corporation Limited engages in the digital copyright and marketing, business information paper, and lottery marketing businesses in China. It offers online copyright services; and professional services for digital content, integrated social media operation, and marketing and value-added services on intellectual property of content, as well as provides services on e-commerce promotion, Internet marketing, Internet operation, brand marketing, and PR scheme based on professional analysis of market. The company also specializes in supplying and servicing of national lottery manufactures and paperless lottery sales. In addition, it offers business information papers, such as POS papers, commercial bills, logistics and product labels, copy papers, fax papers, computer printing papers, ink-jet papers, photo papers, and other office papers, as well as lottery invoices and other commercial papers under the Anne, King, Little Mars, Tropical fish, Bright Color, Thanks, Jinhao, Yahao, Style, POS, Fuzhi, and Furi brand names. The company is based in Xiamen, China.

002521.SZ.summary: Qifeng New Material Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells decorative base papers, overlay papers, non-woven wall base papers, and flicker overlay papers in China. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Shandong Qifeng Special Paper Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Qifeng New Material Co., Ltd. in September 2013. Qifeng New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Zibo, China.

1812.HK.summary: Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited engages in the pulp production and paper making in Mainland China and internationally. It operates through five segments: Machine Paper, Financial Services, Magnesium Ore, Investment Real Estate, and Others. The company offers offset paper, white paper board, coated paper, lightweight coated paper, household paper, electrostatic copy paper and thermal paper, glassine paper; and paper making raw materials and machinery. It also generates and sells electric and thermal power; manufactures, processes, and sells wood products, laminated boards, and fortified wooden floorboards; provides cement, wall materials, panel, and coal; and purchases and sells waste, as well as offers financial leasing services. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of catering services; hotel services; forestry, saplings growing, and processing and sale of timber and paper products; and mining, transportation, logistics, arboriculture, customs declaration, property management, import and export trade, machinery manufacturing, printing and packaging, and investment management businesses. Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Shouguang, the People's Republic of China.

200488.SZ.summary: Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited engages in the pulp production and paper making in Mainland China and internationally. It operates through five segments: Machine Paper, Financial Services, Magnesium Ore, Investment Real Estate, and Others. The company offers offset paper, white paper board, coated paper, lightweight coated paper, household paper, electrostatic copy paper and thermal paper, glassine paper; and paper making raw materials and machinery. It also generates and sells electric and thermal power; manufactures, processes, and sells wood products, laminated boards, and fortified wooden floorboards; provides cement, wall materials, panel, and coal; and purchases and sells waste, as well as offers financial leasing services. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of catering services; hotel services; forestry, saplings growing, and processing and sale of timber and paper products; and mining, transportation, logistics, arboriculture, customs declaration, property management, import and export trade, machinery manufacturing, printing and packaging, and investment management businesses. Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Shouguang, the People's Republic of China.

600103.SS.long_name: Fujian Qingshan Paper Industry Co., Ltd.
600103.SS.summary: Fujian Qingshan Paper Industry Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. Its products include paper bags, kraft paper, kraft cardboards, corrugated paper, color pulp boards, viscose fiber wood pulp, and others. The company offers its products under the Qingshan brand. Fujian Qingshan Paper Industry Co., Ltd. exports its products to Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and other countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Qingzhou Paper Mill. Fujian Qingshan Paper Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

600235.SS.summary: Minfeng Special Paper Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells papers in China. The company offers cigarette papers, including forming and cigarette tipping papers. It also provides industrial supporting papers, such as wet-strength label, aluminum base, glassine base, release, aluminized lining, aluminum foil backing, transfer printing, melamine plastic decal base, single-sided light medical wrapping, medical dialysis, capacitor and electrolytic capacitor, electronic power, and imitation parchment papers, as well as papers for meat food packaging. In addition, the company offers tracing, sublimation digital transfer, low igniting propensity cigarette, mint cigarette, moisturizing cigarette, flavored cigarette, ash-type cigarette, and damage-reducing cigarette papers; and paper rolls. The company was founded in 1923 and is based in Jiaxing, China.

600356.SS.summary: Mudanjiang Hengfeng Paper Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells cigarette-related papers in China and internationally. Its products include cigarette papers, plug wrap papers, aluminum foil backing papers, tipping base papers, Bible papers, and various types of industrial specialty papers. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Mudanjiang, the People's Republic of China. Mudanjiang Hengfeng Paper Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Mudanjiang Hengfeng Paper Industry Group Co., Ltd.

600419.SS.summary: Xinjiang Tianrun Dairy Co., Ltd. operates in the dairy farming industry in China. It offers yogurt, milk powder, milk drink, cheese, fresh milk, milk beer, concentrated milk, fermented milk, and other dairy products. The company provides its products under the Tianrun, Gary, Jiali, and other brands, as well as Ecolean name. Xinjiang Tianrun Dairy Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Urumqi, China.

600433.SS.summary: Guangdong Guanhao High-Tech Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. The company offers label stock materials, including coated paper, thermal paper, film, and specialty adhesives sticker materials; and glassine release papers, PET release papers, and other release papers that are used in the logistics, medicine, daily chemicals, food, wine, other variable information labels, security labels, and basic tags. It also provides ordinary carbonless paper and special carbonless papers used in retail, finance, communications, logistics, medical, insurance, services, taxation, banks, general business areas, and other fields under the Guanhao and Haozheng brand names. In addition, the company offers sublimation transfer papers and thermal materials. It sells its products through its outlets in China, as well as exports to the United States, Europe, Australia, Africa, Southeast Asia, and other regions. The company was formerly known as Zhanjiang Guanhao Paper Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Guanhao High-Tech Co., Ltd. in July 1999. Guangdong Guanhao High-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Zhanjiang, China.

600462.SS.summary: Shenzhen Geoway Co., Ltd. primarily provides paper products in China. The company offers offset paper, newsprint, wood pulp, cardboard, paperboard, copy paper, and toilet paper products; adhesives, lignin chromium, non-chromium lignin, iron, chromium, and other lignin sulfonate salt products; paper chemicals; chemical additives; and other chemical products. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Yanbian Shixian Bailu Papermaking Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Geoway Co., Ltd. in April 2016. Shenzhen Geoway Co., Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is based in Tumen, China.

600567.SS.summary: Shanying International Holdings Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in regenerated fiber papermaking, packaging, and printing businesses in China and internationally. The company also operates trading, logistics, and investment and financing businesses. Its paper making business includes various paper products, such as box board paper, high-strength arris paper, beef card paper, light-weight coated white cattle card paper, sand tube paper, newspaper, and other products that are used in industrial packaging, news printing, and other industries. Its packaging business comprises various products that are used in home appliances, electronics, food and beverage, chemical industry, medicine, clothing shoes and hats, hardware auto parts, and other industries, as well as printing services that include watermark, offset printing, pre-printing, and others. Its ports and logistics business includes docks and land transportation; and operates a port. The company was formerly known as Anhui Shanying Paper Industry Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shanying International Holdings Co.,Ltd. in March 2017. Shanying International Holdings Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

600793.SS.summary: Yibin Paper Industry Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. The company offers food packaging base paper, household paper base paper, and household paper finished products. Yibin Paper Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1944 and is based in Yibin, China.

600963.SS.short_name: YUEYANG FOREST AND PAPER CO LTD
600963.SS.summary: Yueyang Forest & Paper Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells cultural, industrial, and packaging paper products in the People's Republic of China, Asia, and East Africa. Its products include offset printing papers, digital printing papers, copy papers, refined lightweight coated papers, lightweight coated papers, wood pulp and high white offset papers, light offset papers, industrial base papers, refined kraft papers, stretch papers bag papers, pigment finishing offset papers, high-grade color printing newspapers, color printing super-calendered papers, high-white industrial coated papers, electrostatic copy papers, tape base papers, carbon-free base papers, forest- papers, and carbon-free copy base papers. The company also offers garden engineering construction, landscape planning and design, green conservation, and ecological management services for municipal projects, urban parks, urban landscape projects, and other municipal and real estate projects. It serves publishers, magazines, large printing plants, paper products processing companies, paper products dealers, etc. The company also exports its products. Yueyang Forest & Paper Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Yueyang, the People's Republic of China.

600966.SS.long_name: Shandong Bohui Paper Industry Co., Ltd.
600966.SS.summary: Shandong Bohui Paper Industry Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells paper products in China. It offers high-grade coated white cardboards for daily necessities packaging, cosmetic packaging, pharmaceutical packaging, handbags, composites, transfer printing, cigarette boxes, and box packaging, as well as offset, flexo, and gravure printing; and copper cards for use in book covers, magazine covers, greeting cards, packaging bags, desk calendars, calendars, etc. The company also provides kraftliner paper for high-grade electrical packaging, export product packaging, etc.; gypsum face paper for ordinary and special gypsum boards, and waterproof and fireproof gypsum boards; and double adhesive paper used in books, periodicals, textbooks, manuals, teaching materials, teaching aids, journals, etc. In addition, it offers lightweight paper for use in teaching materials, teaching aids, journals, magazines, society books, etc.; and writing paper, as well as paper pulp. Shandong Bohui Paper Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1944 and is based in Zibo, China.

603733.SS.summary: Xianhe Co., Ltd. develops and produces specialty papers, pulps, paper products, and relevant chemical additives in China. Its products include cigarette industry paper, decorative base paper, commercial and communication paper and anti-fake paper, low basis weight publishing and printing paper, transfer printing base paper, food and medical packing paper, label release paper, electrical and industrial paper, and specialty pulp products. The company is headquartered in Quzhou, China.

603863.SS.summary: GuangDong SongYang Recycle Resources CO.,LTD engages in the research and development, production, and sale of recycled paper products in China. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Shantou, China.

8481.HK.summary: Shenglong Splendecor International Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells decorative printing materials. The company offers PVC furniture films, flooring decorative paper, and PVC flooring films; and melamine impregnated paper and finish foil paper. It also manufactures and sales craft pictures. The company's products are primarily used in furniture, cabinets, framework, door panels, fire proof boards, melamine boards, chip boards, density boards and floorboards etc. Shenglong Splendecor International Limited sells its products under the Splendecor brand in the People's Republic of China, Pakistan, India, Kenya, Thailand, and internationally. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

ITP.summary: IT Tech Packaging, Inc. produces and distributes paper products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers corrugating medium papers and offset printing papers. It also provides tissue paper products, including toilet papers, boxed and soft-packed tissues, handkerchief tissues, and paper napkins, as well as bathroom and kitchen paper towels under the Dongfang Paper brand. In addition, the company produces and sells non-medical single-use face masks. The company was formerly known as Orient Paper, Inc. and changed its name to IT Tech Packaging, Inc. in August 2018. IT Tech Packaging, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Baoding, the People's' Republic of China.

NDGPF.summary: Nine Dragons Paper (Holdings) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells packaging paper, recycled printing and writing paper, and specialty paper products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers linerboard products, including kraft, test, white top, and coated linerboards; corrugated cardboard products; coated duplex boards; and specialty paper. It also provides recycled printing and writing paper, such as uncoated wood-free paper and office paper; capacitor tissue paper; low and high voltage, ultra-high-voltage transformer coil winding, and heat-resistant insulating paper; and recycled and kraft pulp. It also distributes its products in Vietnam, Malaysia, and the United States. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China. Nine Dragons Paper (Holdings) Limited is a subsidiary of Best Result Holdings Limited.

NDGPY.summary: Nine Dragons Paper (Holdings) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells packaging paper, recycled printing and writing paper, and specialty paper products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers linerboard products, including kraft, test, white top, and coated linerboards; corrugated cardboard products; coated duplex boards; and specialty paper. It also provides recycled printing and writing paper, such as uncoated wood-free paper and office paper; capacitor tissue paper; low and high voltage, ultra-high-voltage transformer coil winding, and heat-resistant insulating paper; and recycled and kraft pulp. It also distributes its products in Vietnam, Malaysia, and the United States. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China. Nine Dragons Paper (Holdings) Limited is a subsidiary of Best Result Holdings Limited.

SCD1.F.summary: Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited engages in the pulp production and paper making in Mainland China and internationally. It operates through five segments: Machine Paper, Financial Services, Magnesium Ore, Investment Real Estate, and Others. The company offers offset paper, white paper board, coated paper, lightweight coated paper, household paper, electrostatic copy paper and thermal paper, glassine paper; and paper making raw materials and machinery. It also generates and sells electric and thermal power; manufactures, processes, and sells wood products, laminated boards, and fortified wooden floorboards; provides cement, wall materials, panel, and coal; and purchases and sells waste, as well as offers financial leasing services. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of catering services; hotel services; forestry, saplings growing, and processing and sale of timber and paper products; and mining, transportation, logistics, arboriculture, customs declaration, property management, import and export trade, machinery manufacturing, printing and packaging, and investment management businesses. Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Shouguang, the People's Republic of China.

UOPN.F.summary: IT Tech Packaging, Inc. produces and distributes paper products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers corrugating medium papers and offset printing papers. It also provides tissue paper products, including toilet papers, boxed and soft-packed tissues, handkerchief tissues, and paper napkins, as well as bathroom and kitchen paper towels under the Dongfang Paper brand. In addition, the company produces and sells non-medical single-use face masks. The company was formerly known as Orient Paper, Inc. and changed its name to IT Tech Packaging, Inc. in August 2018. IT Tech Packaging, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Baoding, the People's' Republic of China.
